attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Walthamstow Greyhound track has not only provided 75 years of fun, entertainment and great nights out for all lucky enough to have ever visited, but is also a landmark. It is now due to close in August.  After 75 years in business, no one wants to see the famous track turned into yet more houses. There must be 1000s of sites Mr. Wimpey can use to build his houses. Does it really need to be on our site?
